name: BizzyBitsyBee
description: BizzyBitsyBee just finished up a wild week at work and is ready to let loose with some friends. She has decided to throw a wild tea party this weekend! There’s only one problem—all the honey she made this week is gone…gone…GONE! The naughty neighborhood bear, StickyFuzzyFingers, has stolen it once again! Help BizzyBitsyBee find all her honey, capture StickyFuzzyFingers, and make it back to her hive in time before her BizzyBitsyBeeFFs buzz off.
